name: blue-flute
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Cures sleep.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A blue flute made from blown glass. Its melody awakens a single Pokémon from sleep.
flavor_text.platinum: A blue flute made from blown glass. Its melody awakens a single Pokémon from sleep.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A blue flute made from blown glass. Its melody awakens a single Pokémon from sleep.
